tool_description: This API provides a random dataset of English jokes s which you can use for testing your application
name: Funny Joke Dataset
title: Funny Joke Dataset

api_list.name: Get Random Jokes
api_list.description:
A dataset of English jokes

Additional fields:
id -- page ID on id.
category -- see available categories here.
title -- title of the joke.

category:
Animal
At Work
Bar
Blond
Children
College
Gross
Insults
Knock-Knock
Lawyer
Lightbulb
Medical
Men / Women
News / Politics
One Liners
Puns
Redneck
Religious
Sports
Tech
Yo Momma
Other / Misc
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://funny-joke-dataset.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "funny-joke-dataset.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://funny-joke-dataset.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "funny-joke-dataset.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
